column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I'm also a huge fan of the space - huge windows which bring in lots of natural light
column2: and lots of community seating on antique pieces of furniture. Quite an eclectic mix
column3: just like their staff. Supposedly the entire team comes from a variety of backgrounds and geographical locations
column4: where they were all the best at what they did. And they came together to do what they wanted most.
